sections.heading: Employees Retirement Board; duties; rules and regulations
sections.text: It shall be the duty of the board to administer the County Employees Retirement Act as provided in section 84-1503. The board may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the act.SourceLaws 1965, c. 94, § 5, p. 404;Laws 1969, c

23-2305.Public Employees Retirement Board; duties; rules and regulations.

It shall be the duty of the board to administer the County Employees Retirement Act as provided in section 84-1503. The board may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the act.

SourceLaws 1965, c. 94, § 5, p. 404;Laws 1969, c. 172, § 2, p. 752;Laws 1979, LB 416, § 1;Laws 1985, LB 347, § 3;Laws 1991, LB 549, § 2;Laws 1995, LB 369, § 3;Laws 1996, LB 847, § 3;Laws 2018, LB1005, § 2.
